p: The mean peroxide index values (mEq O 2/kg fat) for treatments with sunflower oil, without sunflower oil, with antioxidants, and without antioxidants were 0.35, 0.38, 0.30, and 0.42 (SEM = 0.06), respectively. There were no effects of time and no interaction between oil and antioxidants ( p > 0.05).
